website_summaries.verdict: Despite poor documentation, this option stands out for its compact design, versatility, and long-lasting battery.Works with a variety of nefarious devices, such as hidden cameras, GPS trackers on cars, and bugs.
pros: Rechargeable battery lasts a long 15 to 20 hours, and can be charged via USB or AC
Sleek design that is compact and portable
cons: Instructions are fairly poor, so you will largely be figuring it out on your own

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Nice little gadget. Instructions are not the best, but it's easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The signal detector works very well.
customer_reviews.text: The signal detector works very well. It definitely picks up any signal such as the one from my lap top and our security cameras. We haven't taken it on a trip yet, but look forward to using it to scan the hotel room when we do. It was delivered very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Schwartz Alarice

customer_reviews.title: Everything works well. Some if the instructions doesn't make any sense.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the instructions didn't make sense, but you can eventually piece it together. Everything else is same as described!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not that easy
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work all that well. Got it for a friend, but there are so many signals around, hard to get a clear reading.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Product quality seems ok, lacking directions.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because a friend thought her car was being bugged and tracked. I have a GSP tracking device on my work vehicle, as well as a camera device, was not able to figure out how to operate. Directions not included. They refund me for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Keyser

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: As a good helper for travel, I recommend it to you.It can be used to check the safety of hotel rooms while traveling. The signal detector is very portable and very small. It is recommended to take it with you.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is not working correctly the sensitivity knob is broken not worth the money at all easy to use if it was in working condition. No quality control in this item .
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with this product. It's pretty much but or miss. The instructions are obviously Chinese, and very small print. I actually can't read them , even with my glasses. That's pretty bad. Im sorry, but I must return this product. Regrets, Jeffrey Grow
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Grow

customer_reviews.title: Direction of signal ?
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. But when searching for signal source I think it is best to hold it in a horizontal position with the front of unit facing you like normal. When the antenna is vertical the signal strength changes and that complicates finding the source. I deducted 1 star because the on/off button fell off 1st time out off the box.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Klykun

customer_reviews.title: Not practicle
customer_reviews.text: Picks up so much signal that it is not useful to pin point a spy device in a room.
customer_reviews.author: Chimate

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it, found it way to cheesy for how much it cost! Reminds me of a child’s dollar store prize.
customer_reviews.author: Russ howard

customer_reviews.title: Terrible:  Cable broke off after short usage
customer_reviews.text: The cable is a terrible design. It broke out of the socket after short usage. Customer Support did not provide repair or replacement... Don't buy this..
customer_reviews.author: no-nonsense-techreview

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not but this product. You can not detect hidden objects because it beeps at everything. I had several friends try to use it ,thinking it was me but they had same results waste of money for sure
customer_reviews.author: Loreen howell

customer_reviews.title: Maybe worth $7 (as a toy) - In my opinion, it is Garbage
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars, then I would. (My question is "Who gave it all the high ratings?") In short - IT'S GARBAGE. SAVE YOUR MONEY. It does look nice. It is metal with plastic buttons, but in my opinion, it is Garbage. We tried it on several microphones, cell phones, desk phones, stereo speakers (using various levels of sensitivity) and we got either nothing, or the sense of movement of the device caused it to react. WE Gave it to our 2 year old niece as a toy. She now thinks she has a cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Greg the American Expat in The Philippines

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good product
customer_reviews.text: In all honestly I wasn’t sure what to make of this. I have purchased the cheap $10-$15 dollar versions that seem to work to some degree. When I saw this one and saw the much higher price I was skeptical. I must say I am very pleased. The sensitivity control works well. And after several tests around the home, I am very happy with this and feel it is well made and dependable. I am a pleased buyer.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyG

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for replacement working device!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas and initially thought this electronic equipment was well built and properly operating. Charged the device and it seemed to operate appropriately with the sensitivity dial responsive. A few days later the device was not responsive and was at full value without any sensitivity. Reported to Amazon that the device was defective and Amazon said they will work on replacement. This was a week ago. No response yet. I will update this when I have a response.
customer_reviews.author: Van Wanggaard Racine Wi

customer_reviews.title: No option to silence
customer_reviews.text: It sounds as effective. It doesn't have an option to silence detection while searching, reason for low scoring. Instructions, for me didn't make sense.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but this is junk. I returned it. It did not work at all. Maybe I didn’t know how to use it, but then the instructions were not very good.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiP

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described but I needed something for outdoors. Very quality made even though it didn’t help me much. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: K W.

customer_reviews.title: Even if it were smaller, it would be more perfect, and the whole would still be acceptable
customer_reviews.text: We need to use such things when we work. The previous effect was not very good and we couldn't hear clearly. Now this one we just got is satisfactory. There is no problem at present. If it is smaller, it will be more perfect and the whole is acceptable!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were poorly written. The devices beeped at everything that had an electrical current and made no distinction between signals. It was useless. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: k'smom

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Cheap toy that doesn't work. There best part about it was that I could return it, don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ann

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. I put my cellphone next to it, it wont even give me a signal or beeping sound.
customer_reviews.author: JCj

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product successfully detected all the various devices in my home. The sensitivity can be adjusted as needed. When we go on vacation, we will bring this with us to help protect our privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bohan

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, goes off everywhere as we are inundated by signals and it picks up all of them...
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: now I know
customer_reviews.text: helped me,helps, to know that I am being recorded through the ceiling of my apt.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Ray Dorzok

customer_reviews.title: Not difficult to use, you just have to study it.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Instructions are a big goofy due to translation but close enough. Tested at home so its ready for future hotel room use
customer_reviews.author: Sheppard Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: I used it to detect my office.
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the competitors are very clear about our every move. I purchased this equipment to test my office. And I will open it to protect our trade secrets during the meeting.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Lamb

customer_reviews.title: You buy now, on sale!
customer_reviews.text: This very beneficial for spy finding out gubermint watch you all a time now, chop chop. You buy now!
customer_reviews.author: Dudeboy 1959
